name: Listened to Dear Internet Episode 41: Ghost Feats

content.html:
Dear Internet, On this weeks show we “the most perfect dear internet question” according to one Tim Lanning. This week we talk about Weed theft. There’s only one suspect, but how can we know for sure. We talk about the power of ghosts, specifically when it comes to attack strength. And we talk about power words and how they should be reserved less they lose their power. Stay gold, XOXO We are a new show, and would greatly appreciate if you could leave us a 5-star review on your podcast app of choice! If you want more Dear Internet, please consider supporting us on patreon through Dear Internet. Sincerely, The coHosts- Nick Bristow, Jennifer Cheek, Michael DiMauro, and Tim Lanning! Apple Podcast, Spotify, RSS – follow us on Twitter!

By Dear Internet
